history.proof: intros c a b pr. unfold RiemannInt. hauto l: on depth: 3use: RiemannInt_P15.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of RiemannInt_P15 (RiemannInt _) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment c, a, b : R pr : Riemann_integrable (fun _ : R => c) a b Unable to unify "c * (b - a)" with "let (a0, _) := RiemannInt_exists pr RinvN RinvN_cv in a0".

original: intros c a b pr. unfold RiemannInt. rewrite RiemannInt_P15. reflexivity.
